section.title: sps-ig-oame-0_dynamic.policy
section.codeblock:
{ "8938b453-64da-43a2-9d59-d114d81824ef_dynamic.policy": { "10.76.180.208": { "group_level_backup_list": [], "backuplist": [ "/tmp/sdc_backup/", "/etc/td-agent/plugin", # /etc/td-agent/plugin/ dir is empty in sps-centralmanagement-0 "/appdata/ha/backup.tar.gz", "/opt/healthcheck/log", "/opt/healthcheck/config", "/opt/healthcheck/plugins", "/opt/healthcheck/suites", "/etc/fstab", "/etc/confd/conf.d/logrotate_conf", "/etc/confd/templates/logrotate_conf", "/appdata/LCM/sysdata/", "/appdata/LCM/fstab" ], "excludelist": [] }, "schedule": [] } }
# None of the items in the backup list exist in Centralmanagement pods.
